item.title: Man arrested in disappearance of second teen after missing girl's car found torched
item.description: In this episode of Crime Watch Daily: A teacher scandal that shocked the nation. Plus, a suspect connected to the disappearance of another missing teen.

item.title: Teen throws party after brutally murdering parents with a hammer - Crimes and Consequences
item.description: In this episode of Crimes and Consequences: On July 16, 2011, 17-year-old Tyler Hadley was preparing to have a party at his parent’s house. That evening, around 60 teenagers would go to the Hadley household in Port St. Lucie, Florida, having no idea the horror that occurred just hours earlier.

item.title: Pastor’s disturbing secrets surface after wife’s death; Slain mother stalked by ex on social media
item.description:
This Week on True Crime Daily The Podcast: The mysterious death of a pastor’s wife leaves a community seeking answers. Plus, an obsessive ex uses social media to track a woman before fatally shooting her.
Rachel Fiset joins host Ana Garcia.

item.title: German Shepherds guard owner's body after she's shot with her own gun on dog walk
item.description: In this episode of Crime Watch Daily: The mystery surrounding a woman's fatal shooting while she was walking her beloved dogs.

item.title: TikTok killer convicted; Mom sentenced after daughter dies on Mountain Dew diet — TCD Sidebar
item.description:
In this episode of True Crime Daily The Sidebar Podcast: Joshua Ritter breaks down the biggest cases making headlines across the nation. He discusses a husband on trial for murder more than a decade after the disappearance of his wife, the conviction of a former TikTok star for the double homicide of his wife and her male friend, and a mother sentenced in the death of her daughter after bottle-feeding the girl a diet largely consisting of Mountain Dew.
Tweet your questions for future episodes to Joshua Ritter using the hashtag #TCDSidebar.
----------- Joshua Ritter: https://www.personalinjurylawyerslosangeles.com/attorneys/joshua-ritter/ https://twitter.com/JoshuaRitterESQ https://www.instagram.com/joshuaritteresq/ https://www.youtube.com/@CRConfidential ----------- Subscribe to True Crime Daily Podcasts

item.title: Fiancé suspected of murder after remains of art student found in wooded area - Crime Watch Daily
item.description: In this episode of Crime Watch Daily: A man reports his fiancé missing, but the details don't add up.

item.title: Man who fears firing enacts deadly massacre in workplace - Crimes and Consequences
item.description:
In this episode of Crimes and Consequences: Workers at the Xerox Corporation of Honolulu, Hawaii in 1999, stalked by an employee who walked into the building with a loaded semi-automatic weapon tucked under his shirt.
SOURCES: 1) State v. Uyesugi (hawaii.gov) 2) Man Opens Fire in Xerox Office, Killing 7 - The New York Times (nytimes.com) 3) Byran Uyegusi | Murderpedia, the encyclopedia of murderers 4) The Chilling Story Behind The Worst Mass Shooting in Hawaii | by The True Historian | Lessons from History | Medium 5) Massacre's 20th Anniversary: Lessons from the Xerox Murders | Hawai'i Public Radio (hawaiipublicradio.org) 6) The Xerox Murders — Examining Workplace Homicide — Crime Library 7) Delusional Disorder: Causes, Symptoms, Types Treatment (clevelandclinic.org) 8) Honolulu Star-Bulletin Local News (starbulletin.com) 9) Peter Brent Mark (1953-1999) - Find a Grave Memorial 10) John Keiji Sakamoto (1963-1999) - Find a Grave Memorial 11) 20 years ago, a killer shattered the morning calm and changed Hawaii forever (hawaiinewsnow.com)

item.title: Survivors reveal killing spree of suburban murderer; Serial killer brothers target couples
item.description:
This Week on True Crime Daily The Podcast: A monster in suburbia flies under the radar, leaving a trail of bodies in his wake. Plus, a pair of brothers who killed together reveal their atrocities after receiving a plea deal.
Alicia Dennis joins host Ana Garcia.
Catch new episodes of Surviving a Serial Killer on Sundays at 9/8c on ID and streaming on Max.

item.title: Mother caught on hospital camera poisoning son to death with salt - Crime Watch Daily Full Episode
item.description: In this episode of Crime Watch Daily: A mother caught doing the unthinkable.

item.title: Diddy faces additional allegations; TikTok murder suspect testifies in his defense – TCD Sidebar
item.description:
In this episode of True Crime Daily The Sidebar Podcast: Neama Rahmani joins host Joshua Ritter to break down the biggest cases making headlines across the nation. They discuss new allegations facing Sean “Diddy” Combs as investigators build a RICO case against him, a father charged with murder contesting his son’s actual manner of death, and a TikTok star testifying in his double murder trial.
Tweet your questions for future episodes to Joshua Ritter using the hashtag #TCDSidebar.

item.title: Woman vanishes from laundromat right before her wedding – Crime Watch Daily Full Episode
item.description: In this episode of Crime Watch Daily: A mysterious shortly before a woman's wedding raises questions. Plus, a controversial case of stand your ground.

item.title: Elderly housekeeper targeted for murder in upscale home over insurance policy – Crime Watch Daily
item.description: In this episode of Crime Watch Daily: A woman killed over an insurance police she didn't even know about.

item.title: Mistaken identity murder: Martial arts instructor executed instead of neighbor, police say
item.description:
This Week on True Crime Daily The Podcast: An innocent man is gunned down in a case of mistaken identity, say police. His brother reflects on the family’s search for justice and the senselessness of his death.
Luis Bolaños joins host Ana Garcia.
Check out our original coverage on this case here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WOOhNULsR2o ----------- Ana Garcia https://www.instagram.com/anagnews/ http://www.anagarciatv.com/

item.title: Woman found murdered in trailer park fire – Crime Watch Daily Full Episode
item.description: In this episode of Crime Watch Daily: A trailer park fire unveils a darker secret. Plus, a convicted killer cleared after years behind bars.

item.title: Prosecution rests in ‘Doomsday prophet’ murder trial; Socialite appeals conviction — TCD Sidebar
item.description:
In this episode of True Crime Daily The Sidebar Podcast: Joseph Scott Morgan joins host Joshua Ritter to break down the biggest cases making headlines across the nation. They discuss prosecutors resting their case against Chad Daybell as his defense prepares for an uphill battle, a socialite appealing her conviction for the hit-and-run deaths of two young boys, and a delay in the case of a woman charged with murder in her husband’s death before a judge determines if she will stand trial.
Tweet your questions for future episodes to Joshua Ritter using the hashtag #TCDSidebar.
